title: In Recruitment Efforts, ISIS Seeks To Evoke Deep Sympathies From Muslims
teaser: In spite of the brutality on display, ISIS is not having trouble attracting fighters to their cause. NPR's Arun Rath talks to Shadi Hamid of the Brookings Institution about how ISIS uses and appropriates religious terms.
